doc.title: Happy New Year: Ieatishootipost's New Year's resolution.....
doc.text: It/PRP has/VBZ been/VBN a/DT milestone/JJ year/NN for/IN ieatishootipost/NN in/IN terms/NN to/TO our/PRP$ commitment/JJ to/TO help/VB the/DT less/JJ fortunate/NN ./. This/DT year/NN we/PRP managed/VBD to/TO hit/VB our/PRP$ target/NN of/IN raising/NN $/$ 100k/CD for/IN Goducate/NNP 's/POS work/NN in/IN Sandakan/NN ./. Thanks/DT very/RB much/JJ to/TO everyone/VB here/RB for/IN your/PRP$ support/NN and/CC also/RB to/TO MHC/VB Asia/NN for/IN their/PRP$ tremendous/NN support/NN in/IN matching/. our/PRP$ contributions/JJ dollar/NN for/IN dollar/NN ./. As/IN we/PRP look/VBP to/TO 2012/VB ,/, I/PRP would/MD like/VB to/TO pledge/VB our/PRP$ continued/JJ support/NN for/IN Goducate/NN 's/POS work/NN ./. Dr/NNP Paul/NNP Choo/NNP has/VBZ told/VBN me/PRP that/WDT next/JJ year/NN ,/, we/PRP will/MD be/VB participating/VBN in/IN their/PRP$ work/NN in/IN Medan/NN to/TO help/VB farmers/DT grow/JJ better/NN coffee/NN beans/NNS !/. Now/JJ ,/, that/WDT would/MD be/VB very/RB interesting/JJ ,/, especially/RB for/IN coffee/NN lovers/NNS !/. We/PRP will/VB be/VB making/VBG trips/NN to/TO Medan/VB to/TO see/VB how/RB a/DT bit/NN of/IN education/NN can/MD help/VB farmers/RB increase/VB their/PRP$ quality/NN and/CC quantity/NN of/IN their/PRP$ coffee/NN crops/NN !/. Aside/RB from/IN that/WDT ,/, I/PRP was/VBD told/JJ that/IN Medan/NN is/VBZ also/RB a/DT great/JJ place/NN for/IN food/NN ,/, which/WDT is/VBZ of/IN course/NN ,/, a/DT very/RB nice/JJ bonus/NN ./. So/CC I/PRP wish/VBP you/PRP all/RB a/DT very/RB Happy/JJ 2012/NN and/CC look/VB forward/VB to/TO your/PRP$ continued/NN support/NN for/IN our/PRP$ fund/JJ raising/NN events/NN !/.
